params.data: The encoded data availability message bytes

params.newDataAvailabilityProtocol: Address of the new trusted sequencer

params.newPendingAdmin: Address of the new pending admin

params.data: Byte array containing the abi-encoded EigenDA blob verification proof to be used for on-chain verification with the EigenDAServiceManager

acceptAdminRole().notice: Allow the current pending admin to accept the admin role

decodeBlobData(bytes).notice: Decodes the data availaiblity message to the EigenDA blob data

setDataAvailabilityProtocol(address).notice: Allow the admin to set a new data availability protocol

transferAdminRole(address).notice: Starts the admin role transfer This is a two step process, the pending admin must accepted to finalize the process

verifyMessage(bytes32,bytes).notice: Verifies that the given blob verification proof has been signed by EigenDA operators and verified on-chain to be to be available
